scripts.dev:infra: bash -lc 'docker compose up -d && pm2 startOrReload pm2.config.cjs --only shipsec-frontend,shipsec-backend,shipsec-worker --time'
scripts.dev:stack: bun run dev:infra && pm2 logs shipsec-frontend
scripts.dev:stack:stop: bash -lc 'pm2 delete shipsec-frontend shipsec-backend shipsec-worker || true && docker compose down'
